tuv.seg: '''SQL Server Management Studio''' (SSMS) is a software application first launched with [[Microsoft]] [[Microsoft SQL Server|SQL Server 2005]] that is used for configuring, managing, and administering all components within [[Microsoft SQL Server]].
'''SQL Server Management Studio'''（SSMS）是[[微软]]的一個與其[[數據庫]]產品[[Microsoft SQL Server]]配合使用的產品，以便於設定、配置及管理其元件。
3.5(If the below image shows up, select Download and install)
3.5（如果有以下的圖片出現，點選「Download and install」）
DIKO supports both metadata and content search.
DIKO支援元資料和內容搜索。
DIKO offers multi-lingual user interface to serve international users.
DIKO提供多語言的使用者介面，為國際使用者提供服務。
點選Tom的資料夾，然後選擇“”。
DIKO provides a multilingual and intuitive user interface including English, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, to speed up the operation efficiency.
DIKO提供多種語言和直觀的使用者界面，包括英文、簡體和繁體中文，以加快運作效率。
Role-based permissions ensure only authorized groups and users can access the documents.
基於角色的許可權確保只有授權的群組和使用者才能訪問這些檔案。
DIKO allows the users to merge multiple documents to a PDF for printing.
DIKO允許使用者將多個檔案在進行列印時合併為單一個PDF檔案。
Enter DIKO URL, Page will then redirect to DIKO login page.
在地址列輸入DIKO的URL，將導向到DIKO的登入頁面。
The Login screen of DIKO will show up as follow:
After selecting [User Management] on the left menu then select the [User Account] tab on the right side, After press the button , the following message will appear:
在左方選單選擇[管理用戶]之後，在右方選擇[用戶帳號]頁籤。按下按鈕後，下方視窗彈出：
In addition, DIKO keeps the versions of each document to protect its integrity.
此外，DIKO保留每個檔案的版本以確保其完整性。
==External links== * [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/ssms/sql-server-management-studio-ssms SQL Server Management Studio] on [[MSDN]]
==外部連結== * [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/ssms/sql-server-management-studio-ssms SQL Server Management Studio] on [[MSDN]]
A confirmation message will prompt the user to confirm the deletion of the user as below.
畫面跳出如下的確認刪除提示訊息。
A container to hold other objects in DIKO.
在DIKO中容納其他物件的容器。
A link to a web site.
A new research assistant joined the school.
一位新的研究助理加入了學校。
A reference to a Folder, Document or URL in DIKO.
DIKO中對資料夾、文件或URL的參考。
A reference to a stored electronic file in DIKO.
在DIKO中存儲電子文件的參考。
After working awhile with Professor Bouchet, Tom was transferred from the department of Gastropods to the department of Bivalves.
在跟布歇特教授工作過一段時間後，Tom從腹足綱學系被調任到雙殼綱學系去。
After working for both Professors Bouchet and Kuroda, Tom decided to continue his study.
在跟布歇特和黑田兩位教授工作過後，Tom決定還要繼續他的學業。
AD 伺服器的IP 位址
Add and install DIKO Sync Folder Mass Monitor to Windows services
新增與安裝 DIKO Sync Folder Mass Monitor 到 Windows services
Add and install DIKO Email Capturing Pro to Windows services
新增與安裝 DIKO Email Capturing Pro 到 Windows services
Add and install DIKO Email Capturing to Windows services
新增與安裝 DIKO Email Capturing 到 Windows services
Add and install DIKO Indexing manager to Windows services
新增與安裝 DIKO Indexing manager 到 Windows services
Add and install DIKO Rendition manager to Windows services
新增與安裝 DIKO Rendition manager 到 Windows services
Admin Guide Section 1.1.15) is useful whenever there are changes in personnel.
《管理者導覽》1.1.15節）在人事變動時非常有用。
系統設置之後, 點擊「連接」
After entering the correct Login ID and Password, DIKO will grant the user to access the system and bring up the Main screen as follows:
輸入正確的用戶名稱和密碼後，DIKO將授予用戶訪問系統，並切換至主畫面如下：
After save the configuration and exit the configuration page, user may click to synchronize without waiting the setting time
在儲存並離開設定頁面後, 使用者可以按一下 去進行同步而無需等待設置時間
After successful connection, DIKO folders will show up on the right hand side.
成功連接後，DIKO的資料夾將在右側顯示。
All concepts, ideas and materials in this document are owned by Speech & Act Education Company Limited.
所有本文中提及的概念、意念及教材均由坐言起行教育有限公司所擁有。
All document activities are stored in audit trail for future review.
所有檔案活動都存儲在檔案日誌中以供來審核。

An '''audit trail''' (also called '''audit log''') is a security-relevant chronological record, set of records, and/or destination and source of records that provide documentary evidence of the sequence of activities that have affected at any time a specific operation, procedure, or event.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cnss.gov/Assets/pdf/cnssi_4009.pdf |title=National Information Assurance (IA) Glossary |publisher=[[Committee on National Security Systems]] |pages=4 |date=7 August 1996 |accessdate=7 March 2012 |format=PDF}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |title=ATIS Telecom Glossary 2012 - audit trail |publisher=[[Alliance for Telecommunications Industry Solutions]] (ATIS) Committee PRQC |year=2012 |accessdate=7 March 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130313232104/http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |archivedate=13 March 2013 |df= }}</ref> Audit records typically result from activities such as [[financial transaction]]s,<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.sec.gov/news/press/2010/2010-86.htm |title=SEC Proposes Consolidated Audit Trail System to Better Track Market Trades |publisher=U.S.

'''稽核軌跡'''（也稱為'''檔案日誌'''）是與安全相關的時間順序記錄、記錄集和/或目的地和記錄來源，它們提供了在任何時候影響特定操作，程序的活動順序的文件證據或事件<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cnss.gov/Assets/pdf/cnssi_4009.pdf |title=National Information Assurance (IA) Glossary |trans-title=國家信息保障（IA）詞彙表 |publisher=[[Committee on National Security Systems]] |pages=4 |date=1996-08-07 |access-date=2012-03-07 |format=PDF |language=en }}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |title=ATIS Telecom Glossary 2012 - audit trail |trans-title=ATIS電信詞彙表2012 - 審計線索 |publisher=[[Alliance for Telecommunications Industry Solutions]] (ATIS) Committee PRQC |year=2012 |access-date=2012-03-07 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130313232104/http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |archivedate=2013-03-13 |language=en }}</ref>。稽核軌跡通常來自一些活動，例如：[[金融交易]]<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.sec.gov/news/press/2010/2010-86.htm |title=SEC Proposes Consolidated Audit Trail System to Better Track Market Trades |publisher=U.S.
Any reference to partial or all materials in this document without written authorization is strictly prohibited.
未經書面授權，嚴禁以任何方式提及本文檔中的部分或全部材料。
Any update on the documents can notify the relevant users via email alert.
對於檔案的任何更新都可以通過電郵提示來通知相關使用者。
Backups that depend on the restoration of an earlier backup are automatically deselected when the earlier backup is deselected.
當取消選擇早期備份時，將自動取消選擇依賴於恢復早期備份的備份。

Before setting up and start using DocTracker, it is required to create users for different roles,, The Admin role can create an account for the (Supervisor, Technician) role, The Supervisor role can create an account for the (Auditor, Reviewer) role.
在設置和開始使用DocTracker之前, 需要為不同的角色創建使用者帳號：Admin角色可創建(Supervisor, Technician)角色的帳號；Supervisor角色可創建(Auditor,Reviewer)角色的帳號.。
Before we can start, we need to follow the steps in the “Installation Guide” to have all the software necessary installed and configure properly.
在我們開始之前，首先要跟隨「安裝手冊」的步驟，把所需要的軟體安裝及設定好。
By default, a recovery plan is suggested.
預設情況下，建議使用恢復計畫。
再在“Mollusks”這個資料夾之下建立“Gastropods”和“Bivalves”兩個新的資料夾。
Create the folder “Mollusks” under the folder “Corporate”.
在“Corporate”這個資料夾之下建立新的資料夾“Mollusks”；
Certainly, you may use the SQL Server Management Studio to conduct the backup.
當然，您也可以使用SQL Server Management Studio進行備份。
Check the Close existing connections option to ensure that all active connections between Management Studio and the database are closed.
選擇Close existing connections option選項以確保所有在Management Studio與資料庫之間的活動連接均已關閉。
Choose “I accept the terms in the license agreement” then select “Next”
選擇「I accept the terms in the license agreement」，然後點選「Next」
Click to delete the user or click to cancel the deletion.
按一下 後刪除使用者，又或按一下 取消刪除動作。
Click the button to save the changes.
按一下 鈕儲存變更。
Click the button to exit the screen without saving.
按一下 鈕離開畫面而不去儲存變更。
點擊「Download and install this feature」
Click OK to accept the default parameters; You may set the default location for backup to a Network Attached Storage (NAS) for nearline storage.
按一下OK接納預設的備份參數；要不，您可以將備份的預設位置設置為網路附加儲存（NAS），以進行近線儲存。

©2017-2019 版權所有坐言起行教育有限公司。
©2017-2019 版權所有坐言起行教育有限公司。
©2018-2019 版權所有坐言起行教育有限公司。
DIKO DropZone Installation and User Guide
DIKO DropZone 安裝及使用手冊
DIKO Diko 安裝導覽 v1.0
DIKO does not only serve as a platform for users to share their “knowledge”, it also enhances the document collaboration among the users in the corporation.
DIKO不僅可以作為用戶分享他們“知識”的平台，而且還增強了企業內各個使用者之間的文件協作。
DIKO consists of two storage media namely Database and File System.
DIKO由兩個儲存媒體組成，即資料庫和檔案系統。
DIKO is a web-based Knowledge Management System which maintains the documents integrity and restricts the document access.
DIKO是一個基於網絡的知識管理系統，負責維護文件的完整性、並限制文件訪問。
DIKO is a web-based, UNICODE-supported Document Management System.
DIKO是一個網路應用架構、並且支援UNICODE的檔案管理系統。
DIKO is by default to be installed on C drive.
預設情況下，DIKO安裝在C磁碟機上。

Database stores all document records, audit trails, user groups, etc. File System stores all encrypted files, PDF renditions, full text index, etc. Both storage media should be backed at the same time to ensure data synchronization.
資料庫存儲所有檔案記錄、稽核軌跡、使用者群組等。檔案系統存儲所有加密檔、PDF格式、全文索引等。應同時備份兩個存儲媒體，以確保資料同步。
Department of Bivalves: headed by Professor Kuroda.
雙殼綱部：由黑田教授帶領。
Department of Gastropods: headed by Professor Bouchet, and
腹足綱部：由布歇特教授帶領，以及
Documents can be classified in different categories.
檔案可以分為不同的類別，
Documents stored in DIKO are encrypted so documents can only be viewed within DIKO.
存儲在DIKO中的檔案均已加密，因此只能在DIKO中查看。
Double click “DIKO DropZone Setup” begin installation
雙擊「DIKO DropZone Setup」開始安裝
Double click “Microsoft WSE 2.0 SP3” to initiate installation
按兩下 「Microsoft WSE 2.0 SP3」 以啟動安裝程序
Drag and drop to upload or download files to and from DIKO server.
可以直接把要下載或上傳的資料拖放到相對位置。
Each category consists a group of fields which hold the metadata for searching.
每個類別都包含一組欄位，用來支援元資料的搜尋。
Finally, clickClick [Login] or Press Enter Key
最後，點擊點擊 [Login]或按下Enter鍵。
For inquiries, please send your email to info@speechnact.asia.
如有疑問，請發送電子郵件至info@speechnact.asia。
Go back to the main screen.
進入「DIKO Drop Zone」界面，點擊「系統」，然後再點擊「設定」。

Government Printing Office]] |accessdate=2 March 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20100608090316/http://ecfr.gpoaccess.gov/cgi/t/text/text-idx?c=ecfr&sid=3094bb76639c37239557767756fd7878&rgn=div5&view=text&node=21%3A1.0.1.1.7&idno=21 |archivedate=8 June 2010 |df= }}</ref> or [[communication]]s by individual people, systems, accounts, or other entities.

Government Printing Office]] |access-date=2012-03-02 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20100608090316/http://ecfr.gpoaccess.gov/cgi/t/text/text-idx?c=ecfr&sid=3094bb76639c37239557767756fd7878&rgn=div5&view=text&node=21%3A1.0.1.1.7&idno=21 |archivedate=2010-06-08 |language=en }}</ref>，或個人、系統、帳號以及其他實體的[[通信]]等活動。
Here are the steps we need to do:
所以我們需要做以下各項：
He is Tom, and will report to Professor Bouchet first.
他叫Tom，會先向布歇特教授匯報。
He left all his work with the two professors inside the DIKO server.
他將自己與兩位教授工作時使用過的檔案都留在DIKO系統上。
Imagine that you are the IT Support of the DIKO School of Mollusks.
假設您現在成為了DIKO軟體動物學院的IT支援人員。
In DIKO, more than 40 document types can be previewed in PDF format and each preview has a watermark with username, IP address and date shown.
在DIKO中，可使用PDF格式預覽多於40種檔案類型，每張預覽內容都有用戶名稱、IP位址和日期的浮水印，
In DIKO, there are two working spaces for the users namely, Corporate Library and Personal Library.
在DIKO，用戶有兩個工作空間，即：Corporate Library和Personal Library。
In [[voting]], a [[voter-verified paper audit trail]] is a method of providing feedback to voters using a [[ballot]]less voting system.
在[[投票]]中，[[選民證實的紙質審計線索]]是一種使用[[選票]]少投票系統向選民提供反饋的方法。
In case of disaster happens, the backup can be restored and the operation loss can be minimized.
即使有意外發生，復原備份了的數據可使操作上的損失減低。
In the Backup sets to restore grid, select the backups to restore.
在Backup sets to restore網格中，選擇要復原的備份。
In the Destination section, the Database box is automatically populated with the name of the database to be restored.
在Destination部分中，Database框將自動填充要復原的資料庫名稱。
In the Restore to box, leave the default as To the last backup taken or click on Timeline to access the Backup Timeline dialog box to manually select a point in time to stop the recovery action.
在Restore to框中，保留預設設置為To the last backup taken或按一下Timeline以訪問Backup Timeline對話方塊，以手動選擇停止恢復操作的時間點。
In Object Explorer, connect to an instance of the SQL Server Database Engine and then expand that instance.
在Object Explorer中，連接到SQL Server資料庫引擎的物件，然後展開該物件。
In Object Explorer, connect to an instance of the SQL Server Database Engine and then expand that instance. Expand Databases, right-click at DIKO, point to Tasks, and then click Back Up....
在Object Explorer中，連接到SQL Server資料庫引擎的物件，然後展開該物件。展開Databases，於DIKO按右鍵，然後指向Tasks，按一下Back Up....。
It can be “English”, “Simplified Chinese” or “Traditional Chinese”.
可設定為「English」（英文）、「Simplified Chinese」（簡體中文）、「Traditional Chinese」（繁體中文）。
It can display and accept multi-lingual inputs.
DIKO還可以顯示和接受多語言輸入。
It is very important to backup DIKO on a daily basis to ensure its integrity.
DIKO每天均須備份，以確保其完整性，這一點非常重要。
It's the successor to the '''Enterprise Manager''' in SQL 2000 or before.
原為SQL Server 2000的管理工具，名為「SQL Server Enterprise Manager」。
Later, when Tom move from the Department of Gastropods to the Department of Bivalves, we need to transfer the ownership of his old files back to his reporting line.
之後，當Tom由腹足綱學系調任到雙殼綱學系時，我們要將他在舊有部門工作時的檔案交回到他原來的上司管有。
Later, he will be transferred to another department and will report to Professor Kuroda.
之後，他會被調任至另一個學系，向黑田教授匯報。
Now, you have to set the system up that people can share literature online.
現時，您要將系統設定為可讓學院兩個學系的人員在網上分享文獻。
Once login with Admin role, DocTracker main page will show User Account Summary as below:
當具有管理員權限的帳號登錄通過後，DocTracker主頁將顯示如下的用戶帳戶摘要
Obtaining the OU from the AD server
On the General page, use the Source section to specify the source and location of the backup sets to restore.
在General頁面上，使用Source部分指定要復原的備份組的來源和位置。
Open Web browser (e.g.: Chrome), input address “http://127.0.0.1/diko/index.aspx”, input admin as the Login ID & 12345 as the password.
打開網頁瀏覽器（例如：Google Chrome），輸入網址“http://127.0.0.1/diko/index.aspx”， 以預設ID帳號admin來登入，預設密碼為 12345。
Please enter a valid email address.
請輸入有效的電郵地址。
Please read Section 3.2 of Users’ Guide for details.
詳情請參閱使用者手冊的第3.2節。
Press this button to create the user with the input information.
按下此按鈕可透過已輸入的使用者資訊來創建使用者帳號。
Press this button to leave this page without adding the user.
按此按鈕離開此頁面而不添加使用者帳號。
Re-type the password for the user.
重新輸入使用者的登入密碼
Record will be saved when the synchronize process is occurred.
同步紀錄會在同步過程發生時保存。
Restore operations may fail if there are active connections to the database.
復原操作可能會失敗若與資料庫的活動連接仍然存在。
Right-click Databases and select Restore Database...
於Databases按右鍵，然後點選Restore Database...
SSL is also supported so the data transmission between DIKO and web browser is safe.
支援SSL傳輸，因此DIKO和Web瀏覽器之間的資料傳輸是安全的。
Select one of the following options:
Select the database to restore from the drop-down list.
從下拉清單中選擇要復原的資料庫。
Select “Properties” under“Compatibility” click “Change settings for all users” check “Run this program as an administrator”
選擇 「Properties」，在「Compatibility」 點擊 「Change settings for all users」 ，然後再點選 「Run this program as an administrator」‧
Select”Blueprint” path then click“Generate H/W Blueprint”
選擇「Blueprint」 路徑 然後 點擊「Generate H/W Blueprint」‧
Select Prompt before restoring each backup if you wish to be prompted between each restore operation.
如果希望在每個復原操作之間出現提示，請選擇Prompt before restoring each backup。
成功載入「DIKO DropZone」界面，點擊「No」
Tom is the new research assistant of the department.
Tom是部門新來的研究助理。
The Supervisor user has permission to create Reviewer and Auditor.
Supervisor角色的帳號有權限去建立 Reviewer 和 Auditor。
The Technician user has permission to setup the system.
Technician角色的帳號有權限去設定系統。
The backup files are recommended to store on the NAS for protection.
建議將備份檔案存儲在NAS上以方便保護。
The email address of the user.
The first name of the user.
The following procedures show how to restore the database backup using MS SQL Server Management Studio.
以下過程說明如何使用MS SQL Server Management Studio復原資料庫備份。
The following procedures show you how to use the SQL Server Management Studio to backup the DIKO database installed to its default location
以下過程說明如何去透過SQL Server Management Studio將安裝於於預設位置的DIKO資料庫備份。
The following table shows the usage of these Objects.
下表顯示了這些物件的用法。
The language for the User Interface.
使用者介面呈現的語言。
The last name of the user.
The list contains only databases that have been backed up according to the msdb backup history.
該清單僅包含根據msdb備份歷史記錄作過備份的資料庫。
The number of records shown on each page.
The school has only two departments:
The selected OU from the AD server
The structure of the school is as follows:
學院各部門間的架構如下圖：
The time of the day to sync with the AD server
在一天內會與AD伺服器同步的時間
The unique Login ID for the user.
The user password of the AD server.
The username of the AD server.
AD 伺服器的使用者名稱。
The “knowledge” is collected from our users’ documents, meeting agendas, emails and other possible sources of knowledge.
“知識”來自我們的使用者的文件、會議議程、電子郵件和其他可能的知識來源。
Then you will see the dialog box below:
然後你會看到以下的對話框：
There are 3 type of sync period, daily, weekly, and monthly.
有三種同步週期：每日、每週或每月。
There are four different kinds of Object in DIKO namely, Folder, Document, URL and Shortcut.
DIKO中有四種不同的物件，即資料夾、文件、URL和捷徑。
There is a folder called DIKO which stores the application, file objects and full text index.
有一個名為DIKO的文件夾，用於儲存應用程式、檔案物件和全文索引，
Therefore, the DIKO folder on C drive should be backup either by using the Copy command or other backup software.
因此，C磁碟機上的DIKO文件夾應該透過系統的「複製」命令或其他備份軟體進行備份。
This check box sets the database to single user mode before performing the restore operations, and sets the database to multi-user mode when complete.
此核取方塊在執行還原操作之前將資料庫設置為單使用者模式，並在完成時資料庫設置為多使用者模式。
This document provides an operation guideline on DIKO.
本文件將提供DIKO的操作導覽。
This grid displays the backups available for the specified location.
此網格顯示指定位置的可用備份。
This is to avoid any potential screen capture of the document content.
以避免有任何的檔案內容透過畫面捕捉而被竊取的潛在風險。
This is not usually necessary unless the database is large and you wish to monitor the status of the restore operation.
除非資料庫很大並且您希望監視還原操作的狀態，否則通常不需要這樣做。
To change the name of the database, enter the new name in the Database box.
要更改資料庫名稱，請在Database框中輸入新名稱。
To delete a user, select the user and click the button.
如果要進行使用者帳號刪除, 勾選要刪除的使用者帳號後按下 鈕。
To override the suggested recovery plan, you can change the selections in the grid.
要覆蓋建議的恢復計畫，您可以更改網格中的選擇。
To restore DIKO is simple, put the database and file system backup from the NAS to the default location (i.e. C drive) and DIKO will be in production again.
要復原DIKO很簡單，將資料庫和檔案系統備份從NAS放到默認位置（即C磁碟機），DIKO將再次投入生產。
To restore the file system, simply copy the whole DIKO folder with its content and put it back on C drive (or DIKO installed hard drive).
要復原檔案系統，只需複製整個DIKO文件夾及其內容，並將之放回到C磁碟機（或DIKO安裝的硬碟）上。
To switch between Library, click the button and choose the wanted Library.
資料夾之間的切換，請點擊 按鈕選擇想要的資料夾。
To use DIKO, the user simply opens a web browser like Internet Explorer, Google Chrome or Apple Safari.
要使用DIKO，用戶只需打開諸如Internet Explorer、Google Chrome或Apple Safari等Web瀏覽器即可。
Updated with details steps of backup and restore, with screen captures
加入了備份與復原過程中的抓圖，再修訂了部分用字和標點符號。
Users can share the documents via its share-link to ensure litigate sharing.
使用者可以通過其共用連結來分享檔案，以確保訴訟共用。
We are trying to provide you a step-by-step tutorial lesson about setting up the DIKO system.
我們希望透過這個教程，使您能夠更瞭解如何為DIKO系統設定。
We need to create a new account for him, and assign new roles to him as assistant of Professor Bouchet.
我們要給他建立一個新的帳號，而且給他作為布歇特教授的助手的身份。
With DIKO, all documents are well protected and managed so the corporation is on the safe side in the dynamic business world.
使用DIKO，所有檔案都得到很好的保護和管理，因此企業能在這動蘯的商業世界中處於安全的一面。
With a web browser, the user can manage and protect the documents within the organization.
使用Web瀏覽器，使用者可以管理和保護組織內的檔案。
You may use a Windows schedule task to conduct the file system backup every night.
您可以使用Windows的計畫任務功能於每晚進行檔案系統備份。
You may use some database backup software to backup the DIKO database.
您可以使用一些資料庫備份軟體來備份DIKO資料庫。
You may use the task scheduler to automate the database backup task.
您可以使用任務計畫程式自動執行資料庫備份任務。
You will see the progress meter at the lower left corner running until backup ended as below:
這時，對話匣的左下角會出現備份進程的圖案。當備份完成，系統會出現如下圖般提示備份已完成的訊息：
Your school purchased DIKO, as it is so wonder to document everything you have to.
您的學院購買了DIKO系統的使用權，而您正躍躍欲使，希望將所有文件都交由DIKO系統處理。

{{Infobox software | name = SQL Server Management Studio | logo = | screenshot = SQLServerManagementStudio.JPG | caption = 一個早期版本的Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio的截圖，顯示一條query, the results of the query, and the Object Explorer pane while connected to a SQL Server database engine instance.
“Suspend” disables the user to access the system.
“Active” enables the user to logon to the system.
